mapper.insert: INSERT INTO global_ip_info (ip, latest_conn_time, insert_time, update_time) VALUES (INET_ATON(#{ip}), #{latestConnTime}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE global_ip_info
lng = #{lng},
lat = #{lat},
address = #{address},
latest_conn_time = #{latestConnTime},
update_time = now()
ip = INET_ATON(#{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT id, INET_NTOA(ip) ip, lng, lat, address, latest_conn_time, insert_time, update_time FROM global_ip_info ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1000
